content: looking for a great stash-buster annoyed with that door that keeps closing this is the pattern for you it has the additional bonus of an integral handle that allows you to hang it up out of the way when not in use the perfectly petite doorstop is worked in one piece in the round the pattern includes instructions for crocheting and filling the doorstop **note ** the pattern is for the doorstop only not for the decorative flower pictured the pattern for the flower can be found in issue 14 of inside crochet
